content.value:
There's a few times where it has fallen flat for me.

I've had referrals where my friend (in one case my brother) who just got bored / impatient of waiting for me and just signed up... so we both lost the benefit. 

Irritating because I had to be "involved" in the transaction

🤷‍♂️
